name: write_to_file
description: Write text to a file on the local system

file_name.description: The name of the file to write to

text.description: The text content to write to the file

mode.description: Whether to write to a new file or append to an existing file

name: read_from_file
description: Read text from a file on the local system

file_name.description: The name of the file to read from

return.description: The text content of the file

name: execute_shell_command
description: Execute a shell command in Kali Linux

command.description: The shell command to be executed

return.description: The output of the shell command
